name: createElement
desc: An internal method that defines how a provider behaves.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: overrideWith
desc: Override the provider with a new initialization function.

name: container
desc: The ProviderContainer that this provider is associated with.

name: exists
desc: Determines whether a provider is initialized or not.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: invalidate
desc:
Invalidates the state of the provider, destroying the state immediately
and causing the provider to rebuild at some point in the future.

name: invalidateSelf
desc: Invalidates the state of the provider, causing it to refresh.

name: keepAlive
desc:
Requests for the state of a provider to not be disposed when all the
listeners of the provider are removed.

name: listen
desc: Listen to a provider and call listener whenever its value changes.

name: listenSelf
desc: Listens to changes on the value exposed by this provider.

name: maintainState
desc: Whether to destroy the state of the provider when all listeners are removed or not.

name: noSuchMethod
desc: Invoked when a nonexistent method or property is accessed.

name: notifyListeners
desc: Notify dependents that this provider has changed.

name: onAddListener
desc: A life-cycle for whenever a new listener is added to the provider.

name: onCancel
desc:
Add a listener to perform an operation when the last listener of the provider
is removed.

name: onDispose
desc: Adds a listener to perform an operation right before the provider is destroyed.

name: onRemoveListener
desc: A life-cycle for whenever a listener is removed from the provider.

name: onResume
desc:
A life-cycle for when a provider is listened again after it was paused
(and onCancel was triggered).

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: params
desc: The parameter params of this provider.

name: read
desc: Read the state associated with a provider, without listening to that provider.

name: refresh
desc: Forces a provider to re-evaluate its state immediately, and return the created value.

name: runtimeType
desc: A representation of the runtime type of the object.

name: state
desc: Obtains the state currently exposed by this provider.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: watch
desc:
Obtains the state of a provider and causes the state to be re-evaluated
when that provider emits a new value.

name: HomeRepository
desc:
Repository interface para Home (domain layer)
Define o contrato para operações de feed e busca

name: loadNearbyPosts
desc:
Busca posts próximos baseado em geolocalização
Usa raio em km e retorna posts dentro da área

name: loadPostsByGenres
desc:
Busca posts filtrados por gênero musical
Retorna posts que contêm pelo menos um dos gêneros especificados

name: searchProfiles
desc:
Busca perfis por nome, instrumento ou cidade
Retorna lista de perfis que correspondem aos critérios

name: watchNearbyPosts
desc:
Stream de posts próximos (tempo real)
Atualiza automaticamente quando há novos posts na área

name: HomeRepositoryImpl
desc:
Implementação do HomeRepository
Reutiliza PostRepository para operações de posts
Adiciona lógica específica de feed e busca

desc:
Busca perfis por nome, instrumento ou cidade

desc:
